channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7399] Timestamp type is not copied by ObjectInspectorUtils.copyToStandardObject
item.description: Most of primitive types are non-mutable, so copyToStandardObject retuns input object as-is. But for Timestamp objects, it's used something like wrapper and inside value changed by hive. copyToStandardObject should return real copy of them.
item.summary: Timestamp type is not copied by ObjectInspectorUtils.copyToStandardObject

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
